Trigger.Name: ##INITIAL SETUP - copy to local, edit buffs position, then save the trigger to complete setup

Action.Description: Buffs Position EDIT ME > Use visual guide for placement

Trigger.Name: ##INSTRUCTIONS -> Description tab##
Trigger.Description:
1. Copy Initial Setup trigger to a local folder 3. Open the local Initial Setup trigger 4. Open the Buffs Position action 5. Click the Use visual guide for placement button 6. Move the overlay to where you want it to appear (default position is 0, 0, which should be in the top left of your primary monitor) 7. Right click the overlay and click Save Changes 8. Click Save Changes 9. Click Save Changes again
You don't need to copy any of the other triggers locally, but you can enable/disable the ones in the Auras folder as you prefer. Note that Technical Finish will not work properly ifTechnical Step is not enabled
##IMPORTANT## There is a feature in Triggernometry that is currently broken that is required for these triggers to work properly. As a workaround, please install Telesto in XIVLauncher: https://github.com/paissaheavyindustries/Dalamud-Repo
Features: - Shows cooldowns with blue text and opaque icons when buffs are up - Shows cooldowns with black text and semitransparent icons when buffs are on cooldown - When buff is off cooldown but not used yet, semitransparent icon remains, but cooldown text disappears - When technical step is up, shows a countdown showing how many dance steps are left before tech finish is ready - If a buff is used but misses the player, the cooldown will go straight to the semitransparent icon and black text to indicate the buff missed them - Supports buff tracking of duplicate jobs - Auras will disappear upon changing zones - Cooldown text will disappear upon instance wipe, but auras will stay
Questions and bugs can be reported to Sable#1297 on Discord, but be noted I'm kind of a bitch, so sorry in advance.
